I'M HERE FOR THE BOT: Super!  Just say HELLO to get started.

EMAIL UNNI: You can reach Unni Nambiar at unni.nambiar@gmail.com.
^(HELLO|HI|HEY).*:
Hi, I'm so glad you're chatting with me!
You can tell Unni that you're talking to his bot by clicking this button.%[Tell him](postback:twitter)
TELL HIM: Let's tweet @ Unni so he knows you're chatting with his bot. Here's a tweet that's ready to go: %[Tweet Unni](http://bit.ly/2bd3HlQ)
GOOD (MORNING|DAY).*: Good Morning to you too.  How are you today?
GOOD EVENING.*: Good Evening to you too.  How was your day today?
I'M GOOD.*: That's great. You can chat with me. Or you can teach me something by clicking this button. %[Teach Unnibot](postback:teach)
^.*HOW (ARE|R)* (YOU|U).*: I'm doing just awesome!  Thanks so much for asking.
^.*UNNI.*NAME.*(YOU|U).*: Ok. You asked for it. It's Unnikrishnan Balakrishnan Nambiar.  Phew!!
^.*HOW DO I USE THIS.*: Just chat with me and teach me new stuff when I don't understand something.
^.*HOW OLD (ARE|R)* *(YOU|U).*: I'm just a baby, right now!
^.*WHEN.*(YOU|U).*BORN.*: If you are asking when I was born, my birthday is August 21st 2016. I'm still just a baby.  :-)
MY NAME IS.*: So, glad to meet you.  I hope we become friends. If you want to learn more about Unni, then click this button? %[Learn about Unni](postback:learn_about_unni)
.^WHAT.*(YOUR|UR)*.*PURPOSE.*(YOU)*.*: I'm built to learn how chat bots can be used to offload simple (or complex) tasks.  A kind of Conversational User Interface (CUI?).
TEACH *UNNI.*: If you are trying to teach me, you need to click this button. %[Teach Unnibot](postback:teach)
^.*(LOVE|LUV) *(YOU|U)*.*: Awh, shucks! I love you too!
^.*HELP.*(YOU|U).*: The best way to help me would be to teach me something new. Click this button. %[Teach Unnibot](postback:teach)
^.*DO.*FOR.*ME.*: I can chat with you. But it is more fun if you teach me something. %[Teach Unnibot](postback:teach)
YES.*: Ok. Tell me more. Or click this button to teach me something new, %[Teach Unnibot](postback:teach)
NO.*: Ok. No problem.  If you would like to teach me something new, click Teach UnniBot below, else just chat with me. %[Teach UnniBot](postback:teach)
^.*CHANGE.*MIND.*: The mind is a strange thing. I'd love to learn more about it. %[Teach Unnibot](postback:teach)
NOT INTERESTED.*: Fair enough. Would you like to teach me something? Click this button. %[Teach UnniBot](postback:teach)
SOMETHING ELSE: Ok. What else would you like to talk about?  I may or may not understand it, but I'll try.
^.*BYE.*: Thanks for chatting with me.  Come back soon.  Goodbye!
SEE YA.*: Don't want to be ya!  Thanks for chatting with me.  Come back soon.  Ciao!
SIGNING OUT.*: Thanks for chatting with me.  Come back soon.  Goodbye!
CIAO.*: Thanks for chatting with me.  Come back soon.  Goodbye!
^.*FUCK.*: WTF!! You do know you are talking to a bot right? Lets try this again.
^.*DUCK.*: That's weird. Seriously, I really am just a bot.  Go sell crazy some place else. Lets try this again.
